snippet.title: Ex Astris Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Investigator, when you gaze upon the Astramorphs, have you ever wondered: 
what set them apart from us despite our close resemblance;
why life on Allindo appears humble and trivial,
yet they hold the potential to shine bright like the stars? 
You will find the answer on this journey.
When the fate of this planet lies within your grasp,
please give it your all and make your choice.

#ExAstris  
————————
Ex Astris is real-time / turn-based hybrid premium 3D RPG published by GRYPHLINE. 
Assuming the role of an Investigator, you will set out on an extraterrestrial quest in the world of Allindo. 

Official Website: [https://exa.gryphline.com/en-us/]
We look forward to meeting you on an epic odyssey in search of the truth.
